players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Let's work together to figure out who killed Charlie and catch the mafioso. We need to question each other carefully during the day."
Bob: "I am the mafioso. I killed Charlie last night to protect my position."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
